en.use plugin description: Heron Handoff helps you export developer hand-off file with design specs. It supports size and distance inspecting, style and component extracting, automatically slice exporting and code generating.

zh.use plugin description: Heron Handoff 帮你导出设计标注文件，支持查看间距尺寸、分离样式组件、自动导出切图、生成代码，快速交付给开发。
